activityCheckButton.description: The text of the button to indicate that the user is still present.

activityCheckMessage.description: The message to display when the conversation has been going on unusually long.
activityCheckMessage.message: 哇，这是一段很长的对话。你还在吗，还是我们在自言自语？

addCredits.description: Text for link to add more voice credits

allowInterruptions.description: Label for the checkbox to enable/disable allowing the user to interrupt Pi's responses by speaking.

appDescription.message: PI和Claude的语音控制。 自然说话，得到栩栩如生的答复。 只是说。

applicationStatusIssue.description: Message to display when the application is experiencing issues.

applicationStatusUnknown.description: Message to display when the application status cannot be determined. E.g. when the client is offline.

assistantIsListening.description: Message displayed when the assistant is listening for speech.

assistantIsListeningAttentively.description: Message displayed when the assistant is listening for speech in agent mode.

assistantIsSpeaking.description: Message displayed when the assistant is speaking its response.

assistantIsSpeakingWithManualInterrupt.description: Message displayed when the assistant is speaking its response and manual interruption is possible.
assistantIsSpeakingWithManualInterrupt.message: $chatbot$ 正在说话，点击即可打断...

assistantIsThinking.description: Message displayed when the assistant is preparing its response.

assistantIsWriting.description: Message displayed when the assistant is typing its response.

audioConnected.description: Message displayed when a microphone is connected

audioInputError.description: Message displayed when audio transcription failed - usually the result of an ASR or LLM API error.
audioInputError.message:
嗯，$chatbot$有点打ic。
你能再说一次吗？

audioReconnecting.description: Message displayed when connecting to a new microphone

autoSubmit.description: Label for the checkbox to enable/disable automatic prompt submission.

callError.description: The tooltip to display on the call button when a non-fatal error occurs.
callError.message: 遇到非致命错误。别担心，我们仍在监听。

callInProgress.description: The tooltip to display on the call button when a call is in progress.

callInterruptible.description: The tooltip to display on the call button when a call is in progress and manual interruption is possible.

callNotStarted.description: The tooltip to display on the call button before a call is started.

callStarting.description: The text to display on the call button's tooltip and in the prompt area when a call is starting.

checkingApplicationStatus.description: Message to display while the system status is being determined, e.g. during load.

clickToCollapse.description: Text indicating user can click to hide expanded content.

clickToExpand.description: Text indicating user can click to show collapsed content.

consentDataDeidentified.message: 分析并未与个人相关联。使用的任何数据都已进行匿名处理。

consentNoPii.message: 我们不会收集或查看个人数据，如消息或姓名。

consentNoSale.message: 我们不会将您的数据出售给第三方，也不会用于广告。

consentPrivacyParamount.message: 您的隐私至关重要。您所说的任何话都只会在您和Pi之间保持。

consentSharingPurpose.message: 分享您的使用数据将帮助我们了解人们如何使用Say, Pi，以便我们可以使其更好地服务于所有人。

continueUnlocking.description: Instructions telling the user how to continue once they have started to press the unlock button.

copiedButtonTitle.description: The title of the button to indicate that the text of a message has been copied to the clipboard.

copyButtonTitle.description: The title of the button to copy the text of a message to the clipboard.

currencyUSDAbbreviation.description: The abbreviation for the US dollar.

currentCharges.description: The term used to describe the current charges (running total) accrued by the user.

disableTTS.description: Label for the option to turn off text-to-speech

dismissAlert.description: Label for the button to dismiss a system issue alert.

enableTTS.description: Label for the checkbox to enable/disable text-to-speech.

enhancedVoice.description: Title (tooltip) for Say, Pi enhanced voices.

enterImmersiveModeLong.description: The aria-label and title of the button to enter immersive mode on mobile devices.

enterImmersiveModeShort.description: The text of the button to enter immersive mode on desktop.

exitImmersiveModeLong.description: The aria-label and title of the button to exit immersive mode on mobile devices, back to the text-based desktop mode.

extensionPopupTitle.description: The title of the extension's popup dialog.

extensionSettings.description: The text of the button to open the extension's settings.

greeting.description: Greeting message shown when user is signed in

instructionLabel_context.description: Friendly label for user instruction that provides background information.

instructionLabel_expectations.description: Friendly label for user instruction that defines what the user wants.

instructionLabel_focusing.description: Friendly label for user instruction that narrows the scope of conversation.

instructionLabel_guardrails.description: Friendly label for user instruction that establishes boundaries for the conversation.

instructionLabel_guiding.description: Friendly label for user instruction that guides how the AI should respond.

instructionLabel_nudge.description: Friendly label for user instruction that gently suggests a direction.

instructionLabel_steering.description: Friendly label for user instruction that guides the conversation direction.

lockButton.description: The title (tooltip) of the button to lock the screen against accidental touches.

lockedScreen.description: A message to display prominently when the screen is locked.

maintenanceLabel_holding.description: Friendly label for collapsed assistant maintenance message.

maintenanceLabel_mental_note.description: Friendly label for collapsed assistant maintenance message.

maintenanceLabel_processing.description: Friendly label for collapsed assistant maintenance message.

maintenanceLabel_remembering.description: Friendly label for collapsed assistant maintenance message.

maintenanceLabel_saving.description: Friendly label for collapsed assistant maintenance message.

maintenanceLabel_tracking.description: Friendly label for collapsed assistant maintenance message.

maintenanceLabel_tucking.description: Friendly label for collapsed assistant maintenance message.

microphoneErrorConstraints.description: Error message when microphone constraints cannot be satisfied.
microphoneErrorConstraints.message:
您的麦克风设置不符合所需的规格。
尝试使用不同的麦克风或调整音频设置。

microphoneErrorGeneric.description: Generic error message with details when microphone access fails.

microphoneErrorInUse.description: Error message when microphone is already in use by another application.
microphoneErrorInUse.message:
无法访问麦克风，因为它正在被其他应用程序使用。
请关闭可能正在使用您的麦克风的其他应用程序。

microphoneErrorNotFound.description: Error message when no microphone device is found.
microphoneErrorNotFound.message:
未检测到麦克风。
请连接麦克风并重试。

microphoneErrorPermissionDenied.description: Error message when microphone permission is denied by the user or system.
microphoneErrorPermissionDenied.message:
需要麦克风访问。
请在浏览器设置中允许麦克风访问才能继续。

microphoneErrorUnexpected.description: Error message for unexpected microphone errors with details.
microphoneErrorUnexpected.message: 您的麦克风出现意外错误：$message$

microphoneErrorUnknown.description: Generic error message when microphone access fails for unknown reasons.
microphoneErrorUnknown.message:
无法访问麦克风。
请检查您的设备设置并重试。

mode_accuracy_description.description: Description for the accuracy transcription mode.
mode_accuracy_description.message:
准确度最高，但转录速度较慢。
容易产生幻觉。

mode_balanced_description.description: Description for the balanced transcription mode.
mode_balanced_description.message: 对于大多数用途来说，速度和准确性之间具有良好的平衡。

mode_speed_description.description: Description for the speed transcription mode.
mode_speed_description.message:
响应速度最快，但准确性较差。
容易打断。

nicknameLabel.description: Label for the input field to set a custom nickname for the AI assistant.

notSignedIn.description: Text to show when the user is not signed in.

preferedLanguage.description: Label for a control to select the prefered transcription language.

preferedModeControl.description: The title (tooltip) of the control to select the prefered transcription mode.
preferedModeControl.message: 选择您偏好的转录模式

previewProgress.description: The message to display when the user is previewing a feature that has a character limit.
previewProgress.message: 已使用 $count$ 个字符，总计 $limit$ 个字符

previewStatusPaused.description: The message to display when the user is previewing a feature that has been paused.

profile.description: Label for the user profile section.

quotaRemaining.description: Label for the quota remaining progress bar

quotaStatusUnknown.description: Message shown when quota status cannot be determined

quotaUnauthenticatedMessage.description: Message shown when user is not authenticated.
quotaUnauthenticatedMessage.message: 登录以访问语音生成和其他优质功能

readAloudButtonTitle.description: The title of the button to read aloud the text of a message.

recommendedActions.description: Message preceding a list of recommended actions the user may take to remediate a known issue.

regenerateButtonTitle.description: The title of the button to regenerate the audio of a message. May incur an estimated cost.

regenerateButtonTitleFree.description: The title of the button to regenerate the audio of a message. May incur an indeterminate cost.

shareAnalytics.description: Label for the checkbox to enable/disable sharing of analytics.

signIn.description: Text for the sign in button.

signInForTTS.description: Prompt shown when user needs to authenticate to access text-to-speech features

signOut.description: Text for the sign out button.

signedIn.description: Status text shown when user is authenticated (without email).

signedInAs.description: Status text shown when user is authenticated, including their email.

soundEffects.description: Label for the checkbox to enable/disable sound effects.

soundEffectsFirefoxDisabled.message: Firefox 中禁用声音效果以防止出现音频反馈问题。

sttMinutesRemaining.description: Text showing remaining STT quota in minutes.

sttQuotaExhausted.description: Text to show when STT quota is exhausted.

sttQuotaProgress.description: Tooltip for the STT quota progress bar.

sttQuotaProgressMinutes.description: Tooltip for the STT quota progress bar in minutes.

sttQuotaRemaining.description: Label for the STT quota remaining display.

submitModeControl.description: The title (tooltip) of the control to select when messages should be submitted.
submitModeControl.message: 选择何时提交您的消息

submit_mode_agent_description.description: Description for the AI-driven submission mode.
submit_mode_agent_description.message: $chatbot$ 根据上下文决定何时响应

submit_mode_auto_description.description: Description for the automatic submission mode.
submit_mode_auto_description.message: 当您停止说话时自动提交

submit_mode_off_description.description: Description for the manual submission mode.

toggleThemeToDarkMode.description: Label for the button to toggle to dark mode.

toggleThemeToLightMode.description: Label for the button to toggle to light mode.

ttsCostExplanation.description: The tooltip to display when the text-to-speech engine is used to read aloud a message, with the cost of the message.
ttsCostExplanation.message: $product$ 将收取 $cost$ $currency$ 收听此消息的费用

ttsCostExplanationFree.description: The tooltip to display when a text-to-speech engine is used to read aloud a message, and the message is free. Assumes the provider is Inflection AI.
ttsCostExplanationFree.message: 该音频由 Inflection AI 免费生成

ttsCostExplanationSayPi.description: The tooltip to display when the user hovers over the cost explanation link.
ttsCostExplanationSayPi.message: 了解 $product$ 如何对音频收费

ttsCredits.description: The term used for the credits currency in the text-to-speech feature.

ttsDisabledSafari.description: Message shown when TTS is disabled in Safari
ttsDisabledSafari.message: Safari 目前不支持多语言语音。

ttsPoweredBy.description: The message to display when the text-to-speech engine is used to read aloud a message.

ttsQuotaExhausted.description: Text to show when TTS quota is exhausted.

ttsQuotaProgress.description: Tooltip for the TTS quota progress bar.

ttsQuotaRemaining.description: Label for the TTS quota remaining display.

ttsVoice.description: Label describing a text-to-speech voice option in the menu

unlockButton.description: The title (tooltip) of the button to unlock the screen.

unlockInstruction.description: Instructions telling the user how to unlock the screen when locked.

upgradeButton.description: Text for the button to upgrade the plan when quota is exhausted.

upgradeForTTS.description: Prompt shown when user needs to upgrade to obtain text-to-speech credits

userStartedInterrupting.description: Message displayed when the user starts speaking while the assistant is speaking.

vadDetailActivatingMicrophone.description: VAD detail when activating the microphone.

vadDetailCommLinkFailed.description: VAD detail when the communication port link fails.

vadDetailDeactivatingMicrophone.description: VAD detail when deactivating the microphone.

vadDetailFailedToReconnectVADService.description: VAD detail when re-establishing connection fails.

vadDetailInitError.description: VAD detail for an initialization error, with specific error message.

error.example: Failed to connect to VAD service

vadDetailInitErrorPromise.description: VAD detail for an initialization promise error.

vadDetailInitErrorUnknown.description: VAD detail for an unknown initialization error.

vadDetailInitializedModeNA.description: VAD detail showing initialization mode as N/A.

vadDetailNonSpeechAudioDetected.description: VAD detail for non-speech audio detection.

vadDetailReleasingVADResources.description: VAD detail when releasing VAD resources.

vadDetailSpeechDetected.description: VAD detail when speech has been detected.

vadDetailSpeechEndedDuration.description: VAD detail indicating speech ended and its duration.

vadDetailStartError.description: VAD detail for a start error, with specific error message.

vadDetailStartErrorPromise.description: VAD detail for a start promise error.

vadDetailStartErrorUnknown.description: VAD detail for an unknown start error.

vadDetailStopError.description: VAD detail for a stop error, with specific error message.

vadDetailStopErrorPromise.description: VAD detail for a stop promise error.

vadDetailStopErrorUnknown.description: VAD detail for an unknown stop error.

vadDetailUnknownVADError.description: VAD detail for an unknown error from the VAD module.

vadDetailVADProcessingStopped.description: VAD detail indicating VAD processing has stopped.

vadDetailVADServiceDisconnected.description: VAD detail when the service disconnects.

vadDetailVADServiceNotConnected.description: VAD detail when the service is not connected.
vadDetailVADServiceNotConnected.message: VAD service not connected. Try reloading.

vadDetailVADServiceShutdown.description: VAD detail indicating VAD service has been shut down.

vadDetailWaitingForSpeech.description: VAD detail when waiting for user to speak.

vadStatusMisfire.description: VAD status when a misfire (non-speech) is detected.

vadStatusReady.description: VAD status when ready and waiting.

viewDetails.description: Text for the link to view full quota details on the dashboard.

voiceIntroduction_joey.message:
你好！
请注意！ 
嗨好！
我是 Pi，您的多语言人工智能助手。
通过我掌握的 32 种语言，我们可以探索世界各地的思想和文化。
你觉得这个声音怎么样？

voiceIntroduction_paola.message:
再见！
你好！
你好！
我是 Pi，我能流利地说 32 种语言。
从阿拉伯语到乌克兰语，我来这里是为了打破语言障碍。
你觉得这个声音怎么样？

voiceOff.description: Label for when text-to-speech is disabled

voicePaused.description: Text shown when voice is paused due to insufficient credits

voiceSettings.description: The text of the menu item to access voice-related settings.
